headline.main: Study Warns of Diet Supplement Dangers Kept Quiet by F.D.A.
headline.print_headline: Study Warns of Diet Supplement Dangers Kept Quiet by F.D.A.

docs.abstract: A new study makes public what the F.D.A. did not: the names of diet and workout supplements that contain the chemical BMPEA, which is similar to amphetamines.
docs.snippet: A new study makes public what the F.D.A. did not: the names of diet and workout supplements that contain the chemical BMPEA, which is similar to amphetamines.

docs.lead_paragraph: ASANOVIC--Susan Miller, 71, of Wilton, CT, passed on April 5. Nutritionist and dietician, food writer/editor, recipe enthusiast, multi-linguist, world traveler, and professor of nutrition at several Connecticut universities. Beloved mother of Tomo Asanovic and Jasmine Shane, and grandmother of Jessica, Anna, Eli, Ian, Kyle, and Lucas. You will live on in our hearts, your unending kindness nourishing us, your vision and virtue guiding us. Rest in peace, knowing you are loved by those you touched. 1/3

docs.lead_paragraph: A group of 14 state attorneys general on Thursday asked the U.S. Congress to investigate the herbal supplements industry after a New York probe of the products turned up ingredients that were not listed on labels and raised safety concerns.

headline.main: States Ask U.S. Congress to Launch Inquiry of Herbal Supplements
headline.print_headline: States Ask U.S. Congress to Launch Inquiry of Herbal Supplements

docs.snippet: A group of 14 state attorneys general on Thursday asked the U.S. Congress to investigate the herbal supplements industry after a New York probe of the products turned up ingredients that were not listed on labels and raised safety concerns.

docs.lead_paragraph: Fourteen attorneys general asked Congress to launch an investigation of the herbal supplements industry and to consider giving the U.S. Food and Drug Administration stronger oversight of the industry, New York Attorney General Eric Schneiderman announced.

headline.main: Prosecutors Seek Congressional Probe of Supplement Industry
headline.print_headline: Prosecutors Seek Congressional Probe of Supplement Industry
